title: Miracle Belle, A Horse with a Secret
description: Note: Originally published in Twisted Vine: An Anthology of Short Stories and Poems.This is a short story originally published in my anthology as Miracle Belle.Belle is the first horse created by Trisha's scientist father after all the horses in the world vanished. Belle spent her life as a research object, but was loved by Trisha who knew her secret. After Belle's last surgery Trisha thought her best friend lost her abilities, so she complied with her father's wishes and went off to boarding school. The friends didn't see each other again until Trisha was grown and Belle was old. They rediscovered their friendship and found a special place to share, along with new marvelous discoveries.
author: Judith-Victoria Douglas
